title: BRIEF-‍Amicus Therapeutics Announces Approval Of Galafold For Fabry Disease In Japan​
text: March 23, 2018 / 1:40 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-‍Amicus Therapeutics Announces Approval Of Galafold For Fabry Disease In Japan​ Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - Amicus Therapeutics Inc: * ‍AMICUS THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES APPROVAL OF GALAFOLD® (MIGALASTAT) FOR FABRY DISEASE IN JAPAN​ * ‍ANTICIPATES LAUNCHING GALAFOLD IN JAPAN IN COMING MONTHS​ * ‍WILL NOW PROCEED WITH PRICING AND REIMBURSEMENT PROCESSES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
